Kruskal-Wallis Test of metrics; separate Basal vs Starved analysis
*NONPARAMETRIC DATA**multiple replicates*
```{r}

install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("ggpubr")
install.packages("rstatix")
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)


KW_PercGolATG9<-kruskal_test(PercGolATG9~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_PercGolATG9)
dt_PercGolATG9<-dunn_test(PercGolATG9~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")


```
